channel.title: How do you make npcs not move when getting attacked?
channel.description: I'm using a pimpscape source and whenever I attack an npc, it walks towards me. How do I make it so when i attack it, it stays in place and doesn't attack back?

item.title: How do you make npcs not move when getting attacked?
item.dc:creator: @runescapekid runescapekid
item.description:
@runescapekid wrote:

i dont think there is away of doing this. if you are casting spells on non attackable npcs that is probably why but otherwise they always do it

Read full topic
item.source: How do you make npcs not move when getting attacked?
